title: The Principles of baking
brief_description: Shows that all baked products of flour mixtures have a common ingredient - flour. To this framework are added other ingredients dependent on the kind of product desired. The factors described in the films are (1) leavening agents, (2) methods of combining ingredients, and (3) oven temperatures used.
